topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 2.0: Uploading an Image for Use

section.p: To create a Compute instance, you need to obtain an image that you can use. The HP Helion OpenStack lifecycle-manager provides an Ansible playbook that will download a CirrOS Linux image, and then upload it as a public image to your image repository for use across your projects.
